question: You are about to take a shot and notice a leaf next to your ball. You remove the leaf, but your ball moves. What is the rule in this situation?*

choices.text: Continue to play from the new position of the ball without any penalty
Replace the ball to its original position and add one penalty stroke to your score
Replace the ball to its original position without any penalty
Leave the ball where it moved to and take a two-stroke penalty

explanation: If you move your ball accidentally you must return it to where it was before it moved and add a penalty stroke. If you don't put it back and play it then its 2 penalty shots.
